channel.title: 2016 on 穆野霜泉的黑洞
channel.description: Recent content in 2016 on 穆野霜泉的黑洞

item.title: 醉花阴（新韵）
item.description: 三点一线忙碌碌[1]，忘怀花草木。 远景寄何方，荒野枯塘，重走拾遗路。 无诗往月今相慕，入词多味苦。 压顶又一山，叠嶂重峦，令指峰艰处。 2016.11.19 南京 [1] 宿

item.title: 打油诗 论文歌
item.description: 愁醒近窗白，交文在眼及。 课题翻新拟，项目和老泥。 大论通鬼簿，小论参天机。 三年剩三月，毕业杳无期。 2016.11.5 南京

item.title: On 25th Birthday
item.description: So many years have passed, And all the sufferings’ve been overcomed, Yet how much darkness must a man breakthrough, Before there comes to him the dreaming light. So many years have passed, And all the sad stories’ve been forgotten, Yet how many tears must a man swallow, Before they really call him a man. So many years have passed, And all the pains’ve been dimmed, Yet how many achievements must

item.title: 陈帆（新韵）
item.description: 陈帆思逝水，结子忆青梅。 碌碌重碌碌，无为复无为。 2016.1.25 南京
